item.title: 以色列说，它杀死了哈马斯军事翼的长期发言人 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: 在以色列每天停顿援助＆nbsp; 《纽约时报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiqafbvv95cuxqcczbvevhqccccccccccc0dltvrldjnmb2xurhytrvzysujhowtlvzysujhowtltlvzyttltlvzyttltltlvzyttltlytrvzyttllvzytltlytrvle tlytly S1BMW9ERGpqZEU1aHI4M1UweTYyV1pXRjhhUDQtcmV5SjNyN2tWUHBJMXc4TTlXUllaYzR4RVc3UmxaTzBwUlN1Tk9Ea1l2ek1rUXcydE13SnNmeW5ma2J4cThwMDA3SWJtUnY?oc=5" Target =“ _ Blank”>以色列杀死哈马斯发言人，随着安全机柜的开会，讨论加沙的进攻 ＆nbsp; ap ap News> ap News

item.title: 阿富汗地震：至少有20名被杀，数十人更害怕死亡-BBC
item.description: 阿富汗地震：至少有20名被杀，数十人害怕死亡＆nbsp; bbc 强大的地震岩石阿富汗的库纳尔（Kunar href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijafbvv95cuxns19mef9kuw0zz0zz05Oec1kvvi5ced4b3vwm2l4elv4bmltwnzmyjdacmu5efn3al nlu2fgltroc3ztzetacdy5rdjvwjrlvhvyyjhpre9iwkvozzdloghnsthjaxvjvgo1vgo1vec2dddddllcfnquzosjc3akc4c4c4c4 target =“ _ blank”>在6.0-magnitude地震岩石岩石岩石岩石＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn> cnn 幅度6.0地震在阿富汗的Jalalabad附近击中，USGS说 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilwfbvv95cuxqwefichbhdtjvqk1wukywcwokywcwo3yzhiuzhiuzflcurxzufhajjjjjjyr21jqvnuzhvaseo3nvaseo3nvjj4nvj4ree1kz s nppneixenytreiwoglnltq5mklmrlrnn0xzdwl3ze9lumlwb1o5dkfprevprevdzf9uoed4q0rcz0rcz0vqlw9vtzlqegegegegegegegegegegqlqeg5zlqsuk5zyknqsu1tm0m1vksgksgvsgvsgvesgves5sgzxsgzxsgves5 = = target =“ _ blank”>打破：数百人担心在阿富汗地震中死亡＆nbsp; nbsp; 澳大利亚广播公司

item.title: Zelenskyy宣布逮捕了亲西方的乌克兰政客Andriy Parubiy -AP News枪杀死亡
item.description: Zelenskyy宣布在枪击死亡中被捕，乌克兰政治家Andriy Parubiy href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte1iy2vlzvpgyuj4vxh0q0c4rnnnn3deq2 murzehfvr21vowjgzfztyle4t2tymhzvsgxzq3bjdnbzngvhbes0bulyng96mefur0zdyllxmdnfvfnbzw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>致命射击乌克兰政客后的逮捕 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiswFBVV95cUxNajNrdWdNMUVMaEVVb1p6UGRDRlMyLXBnOXhKcDV0Vm9LUXlzVHVYX2dGUGpkWVpoUU5xd0pCVDdQVU4zMHFyMGQ4 mmxyzu16efiwthq2ntbcshrvvrioex2uglpnjhrdmtbalpqdhronjvisnhdnhdnndlvexebvffffffcam nnd0vxbkrhsljacvlgbgzuqxc3v292mgndskrjtgn5dzy4y1lpz2jwouptazrcae1ltq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>因谋杀前乌克兰政治家而被捕的嫌疑人Zelenskyy说 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmifkfvx3lxte9kcehdc0nss2dbatu5zunrv2v2v3z0njvg966y2vzehk3dfr6ns1gn1i5 bvy1vet2swq5etnldk9blw04ulqzbgjoexdkyxdkymliuw9ysek1vhhkdmhlbi02dmpvdzjlc2czr19tam11dzvknvknvzwknvzwknvzwrw1mnuxmsvhtslo1qq？oc = 5” target =“ _ blank”>著名的乌克兰政治家在'精心计划的攻击中枪杀死亡，警方说＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn Zelenskiy说，嫌疑犯在杀死Andriy Parubiy ＆nbsp; nbsp; bloomberg.com

item.title: 胡塞叛军突袭了也门的联合国，至少有11人 - 路透社
item.description: houthi叛军在也门袭击联合国，至少拘留11人＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiowfbvv95cuxnscnsc1yugvjtfrozhnqtlvwwwwwwwlcytnbqbddynenennennenj5udfnmwudfnmwryxzzzzlmwryxzlclclclclclclclclclclclclclclclclclclclclclclhhykkhhykkkvdy0rsrsrsrsrsrdnrd andrdd and rdnd rdndnd and rd HpqZm1UTjBDS0lfTHhUMHhoaWpJNDlzQUM4RXdwb0lvRkFTbVYyQkxRdVRFbTlwMW51ZkNhaFlJOHdNcFlsU044aUtmd0lPTWVnMmtJZGVlVXJmQVRycXdrZUpWSUk2MjJB?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>霍西斯至少在萨那（Sana’a）的两个机构中拘留了至少11名联合国工人＆nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwwfbvvv95cuxoohdyb1h6wva1vtfdburc DE44UFVVTKHTNGD0AWNFDDBHQ3P0Y0FXSNJWDFVHUMHHVZGYYYVZFCK1XQMHQZGRWU0VYUHNXQNLZNLZNVO ydungsg1dyvhzmws1athdeeq5S2POA1PNSKLKTVBQCJNSCFPIEEXBZVDDDDDDZUTM1NGZGZGZGZGZGZIRGJUD0VNBL hydmh3evctOWCTOWCRENNAKJXSWE1ZMJWOC1VYXQZMTHVBS04BGDJUE15Y0Y3EKZDXZHRWTLHTGS？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>伊朗支持的霍西斯突袭联合国和也门的儿童代理机构，拘留员工＆nbsp; nbsp; npr href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMijgFBVV95cUxNcHY3dWxLUllYTVhFVGxFYTJiUzdjenhVSnkyZWlUWVJjU08yYnMySWxvck9hbWl OQmw1VnBjMzhpNUVHY2p5ZVVydlp0RWlESHZGNjlmY0Zhb3VJQ0d3dzZJSi1fVEVHQ1pJWENLSkctY2Npb3hwb0lTQXF1OUNBaHI4TU1uV1ZyVm84ZEJ3?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>以色列罢工后，胡塞斯（Houthis）拘留联合国工作人员，杀死了集团的总理＆nbsp; nbsp; 华盛顿邮报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiowfbvv95cuxnwllfwjbmv0joyv0joyvlgzllgzllsyzlsyzz3sz33sn0rqttv3sn0m4wsn0m4wsnm4wsnmjsnmjsczsczzhuldmq0ndmq0ndxavxavxavxavxavxavxavxardxavxa.4dndndndndndndndndndnd anddxavxavxa ndd andd andd anddndndndndndndnd andd andd ej6wwvlm2v6rxnsbku2uvnzwuhrujvueklqqklqqknmntbbelfvlvlvj2bhc5cwd5rldnvtrdm GZQNI1TU2Z3WFLLEWVFN2T5WWRTCUVCAWJQAK14D2FKCFBIWGZMWGLOWXHKSWFN？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> houthi叛军至少拘留11名联合国人事，特使对也门说＆nbsp; nbsp; 法国24

item.title: 以色列袭击杀害高级官员之后，霍蒂斯誓言报仇 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 以色列攻击后杀死高级官员＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 以色列在也门的空袭中取消了针对高级政府官员的进场， href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiigfbvv95cuxpdetiv19jr2synk80tnlheuxqtjywvuywsxpvrwj4rfbic0fbic0fbic0fbic0fwwsscksckq quxsckq q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q q5wkdad kxQRGk0VHBEQnBzbkR1S195WUJndks4eTBmVGVjN2RwelBGRmhQMDhjX3JLc00zWlVlQ1RycUt1eEJOOHQyQWF6UW9XSFk1ZDFGcEtWekc5Vk9vVmc?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>也门的胡西斯说，叛军控制的政府总理在以色列空袭中被杀 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikgfbvv95cuxqwgveb3h4ukxpwdhizhdjbutkwwwjqbluycbluyc3hmzwnnnczlkmdb1nmmdb1nmm4mmb1nmm4c0rxsssssvbbtbtbtbtbtbtbtbtq1 fbtq1 V5T1GYSI1VMXPXZMY1RVZFQY1VVW03BU11ZJDNQWFIAVZEUS1YQ2C2C2CZN3CXODRZVMHIEDFFFCNHOS1J5FFFCNHOS1J5AGVBBEGEGEGRETMNAYZNLMNYTCU5BMNYTCU5WWZ0VDB3VDB3VDB3VDB3VDVOUQ？ target =“ _ blank”>以色列空袭杀死了也门首都的胡塞叛军总理＆nbsp; nbsp; ap news 在以色列空袭中被杀害的钥匙houthi领导者＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 《华尔街日报》

item.title: 旁遮普邦洪水毁灭了巴基斯坦的面包篮 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 旁遮普邦洪水破坏了巴基斯坦的面包篮＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiv0fvx3lxte4yotczsv9kwjk0ltnuuhbvrwxwse ZHMDN6SSS03AE1NDKZQEXNKTNFPZI1UWVI5MEZBOHVHTV9ZZKFZU0SZRM53CXYZQLZKR2DPZTVPR2DXDXUQ？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>观看：拉合尔的豪华社区淹没在洪水中＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc 巴基斯坦撤离一百万人，因为几十年来最严重的洪水袭击＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMisgFBVV95cUxQaTZpR21ZcXFIODFNZTJmV2hpMjh1MXhOX2pDa3U3VFVSVndhSHIzalcwVTZDbjdVb1BVSE5uM1M4aVhhaUNtYWd wvkhvrdz6nefnn24xdefqzdj1nfmwzzlive9jbg1vtk1znglhamm1ul9smvpummnnyvhhmwdr qtdormnna19pcujiql9fv0njsxnzuf8zugvzuhjomlvqqq3ATV2HSNZFBA1BLSXVSSEJ3？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>巴基斯坦东部的大规模撤离，因​​为印度从肿胀的河流中释放水＆nbsp; nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f” href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMisAFBVV95cUxOY1daYTlPZ0FZa0NBZUtOSzNvdVY3bW1nUkpodkJUdC15UURIRWtfaFNYVi1ja1l6UTZfSjJDX1p AM3PVNY1LCG1ZSLEZSWFNZGMTDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDJC0YJJJNYWQ0MHHVNU9HM2 Z6D1Y2WLC4Y2FZSLLTRNI1V1PGELBWQ3FGB055RG1MT1NSRE4YB0S1VEVYWUPVWE5CZM pHQUxSSGRGWlRpVtIBtgFBVV95cUxNNnlKTGFIQ1RXVjd0Ml96MmppX0pfYnBRZUN5UlJCT09CSEk4V0R6SGpKMUptRmFXSVFSdnRrUkZsSWJUcy1wc3VGZUJhSHhMYXpFTEtpL uzmcnjjmhhhbump0bv82s3vczgzur3ixuevbrvn0owhztuturnotbgf6lvgwgwwewewewzyy0n2qxxu3yxzrmgzyxzyxzydmxrg9tmxrg9ttmxrg9tuujfu lus oc target =“ _ blank”>巴基斯坦的旁遮普邦撤离了洪水滞留的一百万人＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera

item.title: 巴勒斯坦人逃离以色列对加沙市的轰炸，数十人被杀 - 金融时报

item.title: 随着经济压力的增长，普京前往中国岸上贸易伙伴 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: 普京前往中国，随着经济压力的上升＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiv0fvx3lxte9sbllodufrte5ibk9jodzyn3bkr0 01y1pjlwlhn0fvzmlywhlub203rji0veppeho3ahrhewljctrfwvjrskdvtlizbfjwrnkxqnbab2hfqq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>观看：普京，莫迪和其他世界领导人在中国举行峰会＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc 俄罗斯的普京到达中国的天津安全峰会＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters Putin，Modi和Erdoğan在中国领导人中与XI ＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijwfbvv95cuxnwvm0qtbfmxlzyii1hnda0dfjnbjnbjzidvrsqwrsqwzlsqwzlsqwzlwf5tgf5tgktgktqmytmentmenmenmenmenmenmenmenmuvwxzfmjtwwxzfm qlh6rlrjyujaylitltvor2dtuu12d1gyujzvtghtghtghfmxd5yk54ytzvwtnargu4eku4eku4eku4eku1bfn1rdrwalpvd1vfjocvfjocvfjffjffjfrkrkywpicglpyglpsjvpm3rfvpm3rfvkreudq.reudq yexfkeuudq yexfkreudq yeccro target =“ _ blank”>普京在中国旅行之前猛烈抨击'歧视性'制裁＆nbsp; nbsp; politico.eu

item.title: 印尼领导人承诺在抗议活动后撤销立法者的津贴
item.description: 印度尼西亚领导人承诺在抗议后撤销立法者的福利，使6人死亡＆nbsp; nbsp; 印度尼西亚总统在致命抗议后削减了立法者的福利＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 印度尼西亚团体在周一取消抗议活动，引用了增强的安全性＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 印度尼西亚的领导人说，他将在骚乱之后向某些抗议者鞠躬＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitAFBVV95cUxNNmlaaU5SWFh3dUVlTmtvMXJiYktFRWpYR0llazBpYWx5MGxYTG9CcS1tQUZXMGQyOUVmS1JQQ2Q5VGU2NjJQZXEyd lhwmgxzzfdvaeznodbxckrxntz3mhrya09gotc3x3x3x3dim0pdbhntqwf0sgtrzkz0vnzwr1bgekt AY0FZC1BPSMLRZ0XODZVINWPHU3M5DTTVWMFDLQ2TBBMLVXZNJRLHQWNRIC1VQCVBHVHM？oc = 5” target =“ _ blank”>送货司机的死亡在印度尼西亚的精英中释放愤怒＆nbsp; nbsp; bloomberg.com

item.description: （SCO Tianjin Summit）XI焦点：XI说SCO承担更大的和平的责任，发展＆nbsp; nbsp; xinhua> xinhua href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMivgFBVV95cUxOaEl3bWlXMURvWUZuRVkxYTBoQXRRUTd5VnZTc0VLSmY5UWpBRWFIWUw3ajgtb2lySG9BV0dndlBlVElFYTZ3 dexrd2zymfbjauzzy1heefv1thhdyk9kazb1smlma21jogozmny3zfpcvfpcvfpqmdh1ovd4btlg dghuexbwrdfcc0syvi1zn0nwz0tsvnkxby15dmpxluzeounvtwfjcfm4u2nctkq2mwx3dzjq OEOZWU1OLXA3CLBB0GLBB0GHDAUFVX3LXTE9UM1DRA0L3BUI5B2ZNDMI1ZTDRT0E3SZZESNB4X2LU vlboqvpjukf6t0r4s3bjvevcc2hrbfrstmr0anf1shp5bk9dsg9dsg9zaemzvnhnhndghdghmgrhmfvx EM4XWKXKRGZEQ0XSOFLYDVPRQLLENLFONERTDKX1LXHINLZ3VVFSAHDKVWQZBTDIAM91STK0 bklidnvdqmcxrxnymnzqdth5bhjszlu2qw1arg5qvdjlyjvpa1nwuxjxdjvvsmfhma？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>中国的XI敦促AI合作，在SCO Summit ＆nbsp; CNBC <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqAFBVV95cUxPZUFOREV4Rm1qT0Z1NWpMcmlIZHlTLXBKUGZQbklkeGc0Q05EZTJ6a0d5YVRYd0lERHhIMDdHbFFZaE9Nb zdfwnphvvvfdzwdldv8zevhsevfmwepfywc2wjfjylbydu1bmun3zdhwbvfbdtbdtbvy2wtdfv IEENIRTJHC0C0RWXBMGHFY25FEGG0T0XMBUJ3Y0RJUVB4YLVNNLZ4OGJ1YMU2EGS？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>中国的XI Jinping在SCO Summit开始＆nbsp; nbsp; South Chine Morning Post 中国支持联合国的全球角色，习近平在SCO Summit ＆nbsp; al Jazeera 中国的XI说SCO熊保持区域和平的责任＆nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f“

item.title: 特朗普全球秩序 - politico.eu，中国的XI欢迎普京和莫迪
item.description: 中国的XI欢迎普京和莫迪，因为特朗普全球订单＆nbsp; nbsp; politico.eu.eu <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMimwFBVV95cUxPS2Z5NldDeTJRb1ZPSVhhdXJvLWJaUnRCbzdCeE55RjNlVkJKUjhnQV9VV0RJMi02eTN3MmM3 AW9FBFBHTHXVK4WLXVSNJVTY1F6RTRJDFK2LWKXM09XRVRZUM83WKNQQQQWI1ZMHLVDJETGLMNHLVDJETGLMNHLVDJGXZNMWJGXZNHMWJGXZNHHFB0 Target =“ _ Blank”>印度和中国是合作伙伴，而不是竞争对手，Modi和XI Say ＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 中国试图利用特朗普动荡将领导人团结起来，以美国领导的命令＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiakfvx3lxte11dtd3dlv5cwhob0fxdu9anmvhwunszljxowncv0p 1LTD0DVLKN1RWBWTOTJZ6D3LOCWZTNELWOXZIVE5GWGGJGBKJUYM1VSNVSNVLCVDEQS1QX25GSKIYD1A2YK1PZHRHEHRHEHQ5SKE？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>中国的XI主持莫迪和普京在对特朗普的关税的愤怒＆nbsp; 时代href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi6gfbvv95cuxnvxhmm1hmm1hmmmq3ttkytjd3vlpvruh6uwhxa FVSX1LQUDH1UNNRELRKVNI0TDBKYVRRVS0TNGDXT2E5WFZVBKU5VC02MW9SAXNMMDHOVUDHOVUDHY3NOYWPJVFFQTZWRJUXNVC 2XVCG5UZUVAYKHZMXBJBTC1ZLHNOUHVYWLOT180QKT1M1VJM1VJMEXLVKRSLVKRSWGXUTKDUNXP6R3JTMTRJEF9KTMZXXXXXUVHBOEVFQ 29mumtibfpbvtnbngstbkpsovjfdepztjrrck5tylvqbdkwtkwtefnd2zldzbxn1hjujujujlwzweyqze5zvz2sxkwdve？ target =“ _ blank”>视频：PM，Putin，XI Camaraderie在SCO Summit上； Shehbaz Sharif留在场上＆nbsp; 印度今日

item.description: Zelensky发誓要进行报复，因为俄罗斯罢工留下60,000户主没有权力＆nbsp; nbsp; 法国24 ＆nbsp; al Jazeera 乌克兰发誓要在俄罗斯对权力部门的攻击后进行报复＆nbsp; reuters 乌克兰威胁要在俄罗斯罢工电网罢工后进行报复＆nbsp; nbsp; 澳大利亚广播公司

item.title: “对系统的不同冲击”：de minimis关税道奇结束意味着美国人的购买力较小 - 财富
item.description: '对系统的不同冲击'：de minimis关税道奇结束意味着美国人的购买力少＆nbsp; nbsp; 廉价进口上的关税漏洞已关闭。它将如何影响购物者？＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报 在线购物可能永远不会相同＆nbsp;＆nbsp; atlantic 购物者遇到了取消的订单，延误为de minimis豁免末端＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMinwFBVV95cUxOUGt4Nl9fb2ZvU2hNa040cHlJN0tibFh6M3dEV0I4cmJ6b2RXNFMtWTIzdUV3MmZhSmhJekUzS0N 1Q2X6DGTQNHK1N1NXY3VWTFJIZ0ZHV3DGR3DGR3VMMNLBDWQTMKN6CKC3ZZLHSDZSDZSB2XZX1 ctdfhmdwhbz2w1rgjcc01frwngbdddddvdnhtnnjtwrid2tudxlhajf6t09mdgs？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>免税不再：价值低于$ 800的包裹不再有资格获得美国关税豁免＆nbsp; ap ap news> ap news
